cast.name: 马丁·斯维尔森 Martins Vilsons

introduction: On the day of their twentieth anniversary wwife is wisited by a husband's soon-to-be-twenty-years-old mistress, who offers twenty thousand in case of divorce.Jānis Cimermanis' first - and as of today - only attempt to direct non-animation movie. as this is simple comedy i would never bother to post it here if it weren't for Jānis Cimermanis' directors collection. it's a good opportunity for you to see this director from another point of view and - believe me - you will never see this film anywhere else.film (with this i mean basically acting) is somewhat lame and unrealistic, too exaggerated at the beginning but it get better as film progresses and towards the end becomes quite entertaining.
